content: ulterior motif afghan design by lisa van klaveren 10 ply size 4 email lisa@hollanddesignscrochet com © holland designs crochet this pattern is written in standard american crochet terms stitch demo video available here https //youtu be/6enkmsz-yzc skill level finished size each square measures approx 6 5 wide make as many squares as you d like to create a blanket of any dimensions suggested sizes before optional edging 32 5 x 32 5 = 5 x 5 or 25 squares 32 5 x 39 = 5 x 6 or 30 squares 39 x 45 5 = 6 x 7 or 42 squares 45 5 x 58 5 = 7 x 9 or 63 squares 52 x 71 5 = 8 x 11 = 88 squares gauge note you may need to vary your gauge a bit to finish with the current color at the end of each intended round/color change this may take some trial and error and restitching of a few stitches on each round you can also try to vary your hook size at points if that is helpful materials red heart all-in-one granny square aran worsted weight yarn a single 250-gram skein makes approx 14 motifs according to the manufacturer sample used color black-hyper violet approx 26 yards per square crochet hook size h 5 0 mm or similar special stitches 2 double_crochet cluster 2dc-cluster = yo insert hook in st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops twice yo pull through all loops on hook v_stitch v-st = double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet all in same space motif images above show rnds 1-2 1-4 1-5 1-7 1-8 & 1-9 joining round 1 make a magic_ring insert hook in ring yo pull up a loop chain 1 6 single_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 6 single_crochet round 2 chain 2 double_crochet in same space counts as 1st 2dc-cluster chain 2 2dc-cluster in next single_crochet chain 2 around join with slip_stitch to top of 1st double_crochet 6 2dc-clusters & 6 chain-2 sps auto-color change round 3 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same space 2 single_crochet in next chain-2 space 2 single_crochet in next 2dc-cluster 2 single_crochet in next chain-2 space around 24 single_crochet do not join place stitch marker if needed at end of round page 2 round 4 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 32 single_crochet auto-color change round 5 chain 2 double_crochet in same space counts as 1st 2dc-cluster chain 3 skip 1 single_crochet 2dc-cluster in next single_crochet chain 3 skip 1 single_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of 1st double_crochet 16 2dc-clusters & 16 chain-3 sps auto-color change round 6 slip_stitch in next chain-3 space chain 1 3 single_crochet in same space 3 single_crochet in each chain-3 space around join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 48 single_crochet round 7 chain 3 skip 1 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch in next single_crochet around
